sentences.sentence: The component has simple structure and reliable motion by using hydraulically powered swinging townet rods to drive the townet.
sentences.translation: 这一组件采用液压驱动的摆动网杆带动拖网，结构简单，动作可靠。

sentences.sentence: Today we shall discuss the question of hydraulically (pneumatic) test.
sentences.translation: 今天我们将讨论水压、(气压)试验题目。

sentences.sentence: The platform on which the lifeboat sits is also hydraulically operated and tilts when it is launched and recovered.
sentences.translation: 救生艇停泊的平台也由液压操控，救生艇下水或启动时平台倾斜。
